rubyboo83: Currently BIG night IN, all about the cozy 😊🥰
ted1ble: Big nights in forever ✨✨Always has been, I just pretended for 24 years in the middle I liked going Out Out. In in until end of days🚪🛋🛏
itprill: Burn that candle at both ends!
renagr: Now in my thirties im definitely in! Twenty’s was a big time out decade🎉🙈
naoreilly28x: In in in!!! I rush home from work every time I'm on a day shift because I cannot be late for fresh pajamas, my hubby, sofa and a nice brew ❤️ nothing beats it
heart_rachel: Night in! I’m secretly 85 years old, so I’d rather lounge around with good food and good company. My party clothes are like, totally binding. 💁🏻‍♀️
mazarinstone: I love going out to eat in fancy places, but then I like to come home again. My idea of hell is a nightclub.
bitz_of_mitz: Both! lmao!! Love staying in most of the time but I do enjoy getting ready and going out for a big night!😆
the_original_christina_breen: I'm a night in girl mostly
becvann: In! I like to think about going out and being fancy and drinking cocktails etc then end up in my happy place on the sofa with a vino. Lol x

nolwazinkwandla: I'm craving a big night out. But I typically prefer a big night in 😊

juliacaesarzeppelin: I love both, but each at their time. Aaaaaaand usually, a crazy night out is followed by a cosy night in! 💗
debzlouiseblog: Night in, with too much wine so you end up spontaneously going out at midnight 😂
blanchedevereaux: Both! Usually a big night in is preceded by a big night out 😂
jollygood_time: It depends on the weather jajajaja sometimes is lovely to stay un bed watching a movie or at the balcony drinking a Tequila sunrise. Sometimes i love to go out AND dinner in San Telmo or Palermo. I'm from Buenos Aires.
carolannehunter: For me defo big nights in... Im a single parent of a child with complex needs.. He's just 6 years old. If I get respite it's a bubble bath, a hot cuppa and whatever I like on TV. The small things mean the most xxxx
binge.to.bopo: Big Nights In - most definitely! Though I spend most of my night ‘in’, I’d much rather a friend of mine say “I’m having a house party” instead of “I’m throwing a party at ___”, or “wanna come chill in mine and sleepover?” Rather than “shall we go for dinner and drinks somewhere?”
xlrosx: Big nights in all the way as I don’t like crowds and I get more anxious at night.
modern_fudging_family: I really enjoy staying in every weekend 😍 but love an occasional night out! X
aggyjoe85: Big nights in ALWAYS. I can be arsed with people xx
mayah.camara: Big nights in! Must be a sign of getting older lol. I do love a night out though but I’d rather have people round mine
theweewanderingscot: I like a big night out when I’m on form and my fibro is not given me jib. However, a big night out should always be followed by a big night in to recover 👍🏼😂
jacqueline_caplan: Ooh I like a bit of both. But I love being at home.
tierneys_canvas: I prefer big days out & nights in now xx
dawnlangler: I always use to big nights in but this year changed after loosing 8st and feeling confident in body for once I'm enjoying life and making up for missing out in my 20s
susie265: Now I'm nearly to big 5-0, OMG how did that happen lol!! I would say nights in, but in my 20's and early 30's, it was def nights out all the way so enjoy it while you can, I do not have the stamina and hate hangovers so I don't drink much these days, very boring I know! 😁
wifemumteacher_iow: In! All the food, all the gin, all the friends. Add a sofa and you're done!
muinatabdul: Love both! But as I’m getting older nights in are more my bag! Can make cocktails, wear whatever you want, listen to your playlist. Possibilities are endless! ✨😍
charlotteftrump: *which do you prefer. Big night in! 😘
oddsandtrends_: I love a night in with the right people. Living alone I have a lot of nights in alone and they're old news but when I've the right company I love it. But occasionally it is nice to go out and dress up💜
zeewarriorprin: Big nights out!! Because I hardly get to do them and when I do it’s an absolute blast!😆
mandi.art: Big night in most of the time, but that makes the few big nights out spattered through the year extra special.
ohmamajohnson3: I like about one big night out a month. Other than that I’m all for big nights in. 💕
abbygarcia: I’m a total hermit/ homebody. In.
carey1069: Definitely big nights in, now that I'm almost 50. In my 20 's and 30's it was big nights out only. Staying in would've been punishment 😂

gaellita_sz: Big nights IN! Definitely. I'm such a grandma already and I really enjoy it 😂

inspector_gretchen: Big nights in🤩although I like getting ready for a big night out😅🎉

tracielcarson: Normally nights in, but tis the season DV, so big nights out

selinahilverda: Since you're giving us options, it's 'which' ;)

bally_hayer: I prefer big night in ..But I do like a a big night out .

seggler: Nights in. That cushion is divine 😍
nadeterri: Big nights in! So I can enjoy & hear the company I’m in rather than spending the night yelling at it 😂😂xx

charlieee0492: Mostly in...but an occasional big night out is also great!
ruthwrites_: Erm well both. I love being home and entertaining by cooking, drinks etc but I love getting dressed up and going for dinner and drinks. Maybe not a full night out, no clubs for me 👵👵
mysderberg: Definitely big nights in! Would much rather have a dinner party or a movie night than go clubbing!
